entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
